@dwraith0877 The torrent isn't incomplete. Yes, Season 1 is 65 episodes long, but the torrent doesn't claim to be all of season 1. The torrent claims to be episodes 1-60, and that is exactly what is inside. I wish it was all 65, but sadly, it isn't. However, this torrent still provides what it claims and in excellent viewing quality. 10/10.

There were about 59 episodes out there when i started to watch this anime. But when i searched over the net, there wasnt any bundle to download, and believe me, i searched. So,  the only place i found was the horriblesubs, and there were only 1 or 2 seeders (20 first episodes, more or less) so i bared the pain to download em, took soem time, in meanwhile, ep 60 were out so i downloaded that too. And i figured that there wasnt any decent collection still out there i decided to make other's search a bit simpler and made this bundle for you so u wont have to go thru all the trouble to download each episode with low download rate. By the time i made this, there wasnt the last 5 episodes out yet. So enjoy this one, and am sure you can find the rest of the 5 episodes without trouble now that the whole season is out. And i thought i make a 720p to a bunlde rather than 480p. So decent speed with decent quality brought to you guys, enjoy!
